trans_title: 赞美诗：莎拉·布莱曼演唱会
introduction: In celebration of her upcoming new album Hymn, best-selling soprano Sarah Brightman is in cinemas with an incredible performance. HYMN: Sarah Brightman In Concert was captured live for the big screen from the Festspielhaus in the enchanted Bavarian Alps, known for the historic and captivating Neuschwanstein Castle.Staged in two acts, the 90-minute performance is a hybrid of a ...
chinese_title: 赞美诗：莎拉·布莱曼演唱会
